snippet: Francesco Molinari of Italy held off a barrage of challengers on a third straight low-scoring day at the Scottish Open, shooting a five-under 67 to take a one-stroke lead into the final round.
lead_paragraph: Francesco Molinari of Italy held off a barrage of challengers on a third straight low-scoring day at the Scottish Open, shooting a five-under 67 to take a one-stroke lead into the final round.
